experiences: Improved data visualization platform, adding features and developing dashboards for performance insights on revenue and patient flow.

CRUD operations for entities on the Postgres DB are done using GraphQL, PostgreSQL, react.js, and node.

Implemented UI features to visualize the data in the dashboards.
Managed the data lens of the dashboards by performing snowflake queries
